General.Name: BizRocket.com Inc
General.Description: BizRocket.com, Inc., a development stage company, engages in developing social networking Website. It develops Kidzrocket.com, a Website for pre-teenage children with parental access control. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Coral Springs, Florida.
